Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and functionality. I believe it could greatly benefit you in your daily activities or projects. Considering its quality and features, I am extending an exclusive offer for you today. Would you like to make this investment in yourself and experience the benefits firsthand? My proposal is to offer the product to you for $200. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique value it can bring to your life. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
